name: 100 Years A Vampire
description:
***

Choose from the 7 classic V:tM clans and remember your life before torpor. For the Family. Made for the 2021 V:tM jam in twenty days.

Content Warning: Expect PG-13 stuff leaning towards the dark, bloody, and disturbing. Mild language and suggestive themes.

***

(Thank you for trying this writer's very first game. This was made for the 2021 V:tM jam, so I am unable to add any more content after December 1st, even though I'd love to. I tried to create something with a decent amount of interactivity all the same).

NOTE 11/30/2021: As of 11:56 pm, I finished ironing out the many, many kinks. You can now play from beginning to end! Still have lots of typos and whitespace to iron out. No new content may be added, but expect a smoother experience as time goes on.

12/1/2021: Fixed gender variables and some whitespace.
